import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.scss'] }) export class FooterComponent { constructor(private router: Router) { } gotoHome() { this.router.navigate(['/home']); // define your component where you want to go } }

Our website is a premier job recruiting platform that connects top talent with leading companies. We offer a wide range of job opportunities in various industries and locations, making it easier for job seekers to find their dream job.

  • Home
  • Jobs
  • About
  • Contact
